name: kj_ju52
title: King Jo's Ju-52
author: TheKingJo
description: Adds a Ju-52. In combination with the AircraftRealism mod you will be able to fly above your enemies. When you reach the takeoff speed, the plane gets invincible to everything except 'flak' damage. This transporter class plane has no weapons but relatively high cargo space and low takeoff speed.
